name: rpg-data-editor
description: RM数据拓展编辑器 - 功能强大的JSON编辑工具，支持代码生成和自动链接管理

scripts.electron:start:dev: wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run compile:main && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run compile:main && electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.cjs
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && npm run compile:main && electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.cjs --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && npm run compile:main && electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.cjs --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && npm run compile:main && electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.cjs --linux
scripts.electron:build:all: npm run build && npm run compile:main && electron-builder --config .electron-builder.config.cjs --win --mac --linux
scripts.electron:start: npm run compile:main && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.compile:main: tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && node -e "require('fs').renameSync('dist-electron/preload.js', 'dist-electron/preload.cjs')" && node -e "if(require('fs').existsSync('dist-electron/preload.js.map')){require('fs').renameSync('dist-electron/preload.js.map', 'dist-electron/preload.cjs.map')}"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['dist', 'dist-electron', 'release'].forEach(d => fs.rmSync(d, { recursive: true, force: true }))"

author: dragonbaba
